CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__r.FSM_BusinessUnit__c,'Waste Infra'), ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__r.FSM_BusinessUnit__c,'Water Infra'), ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__r.FSM_BusinessUnit__c,'Metering') ), FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__r.FSM_SeniorTechnicalSupervisor__c, ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__r.ResourceType,'T'), FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__r.RelatedRecord.FSM_ExternalId__c = $User.FSM_ExternalId__c), true,false)
CustomField.label: Assigned to Current Resource?
